subject: From the Desk Of:
body:
From the Desk Of:
Manager: Mr.Jamie Dimon,
JP Morgan Chase Bank New York
270 Park Ave. New York City
This is to bring to your kind notice that your outstanding payment of
$10,000,000.00 which has been with our central paying office from
United Nations has been signed and Approved for payment after series
of meeting with our board of directors,also bear in mind that We want
to conclude all payment before the 4th quarter of 2022 runs out for
you to receive your Fund.
Therefore, to enable us achieve our goal to release your Fund to you,
you are advice to reconfirm to us the below information to enable us
conclude this transaction with you.
Your Full Name:
Your Complete Address:
Direct Tele: Number:
Mobile Number:
Occupation
Nationality.
Finally, Response Should be Made Immediately before it will be too late for you.
Waiting for your immediate response.
Thanks for your Co-operation.
Manager: Mr.Jamie Dimon,
JP Morgan Chase Bank New York
270 Park Ave. New York City,
Office mail Address:

subject: Re:   From the Desk Of:
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing in response to your email regarding the payment from United Nations. I appreciate your efforts and would like to provide the necessary information for the process.

Occupation: International Hotel Consultant

Please let me know if you need any additional information or documents from my side. I look forward to a prompt resolution of this matter.

Best Regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Jonathan
